artist: Artist: Unknown artist, British, 19th century; Publisher: Messrs Fores, London
description: Panoramic view showing marriage procession and ceremony of Queen Victoria and Prince Albert of Saxe Coburg on their wedding on February 10, 1840, celebrated at the Chapel Royal, St James's. The key along the bottom identifies people and landmarks.
medium: Hand-colored etchings, aquatints and roulette; accordion-fold panorama
title: The Marriage Procession of V & A
